name: Kiyomi Main Index (General)
description: The official, comprehensive index covering general media, movies, music, and international providers.
author: Kiyomi Core Team

providers.name: The Pirate Bay (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: The Pirate Bay (TPB) is a free searchable online index of movies, music, video games, and software.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: Nyaa (Anime/Asian Media)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Nyaa is a BitTorrent community focused on Eastern Asian media including anime, manga, music, and more.

providers.name: Anime Tosho (Torznab API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Automated service mirroring major anime torrents; provides structured Torznab data.

providers.name: NekoBT (Private Torznab)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Specialized private anime indexer providing high-quality torrents via a Torznab API.

providers.name: ACG.RIP (Chinese Anime RSS)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Indexes Chinese and broader Asian media collections.

providers.name: Knaben (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Modern, fast search API that offers structured results.

providers.name: Sukebei Nyaa (Adult)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Sukebei Nyaa is the adults-only sister site of the Nyaa torrent index, focused on non-work-safe Japanese, Chinese, and Korean media such as 18+ anime, doujinshi, games, and real-life photos or videos

providers.name: TorrentsCSV (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Provides simple, clean JSON API access to torrent data, listing torrent name, infohash, size, and seeders.

providers.name: LimeTorrents (Public RSS)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General Torrents Download indexer with mostly Verified Torrents.
providers.cautionReason: Unverified public indexer. Contains potentially harmful/mislabelled torrents.

providers.name: UIndex
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: UIndex is primarily a BitTorrent tracker site, similar to Russian tracker RuTracker.org. You can find the latest Asian drama content here!
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.
